name: Lucario Dating Sim
description:
So, I finally made a new Lucario Dating Sim game. I really hope you guys enjoy this I put my heart in it

__

This is basically Lucario Dating Sim 4. I gave up on making another episode even though Lucario Dating Sim 3 was gonna be a 2 episode series.

See, now that I'm in college I wanted to make a game that was more relatable to me.

(Yes, I made all the previous games while I was in high school).

If you play this game for your page please credit LucarioFan68 no need for a link

Music credit to Twilight in Neo Kobe City - Snatcher!
